--- select_singer_with_join_using.sql
SELECT
  *
FROM
  Singers A
  LEFT OUTER JOIN
  Singers B
  USING (SingerID, FirstName)

--- AST
&ast.QueryStatement{
  Hint:  (*ast.Hint)(nil),
  Query: &ast.Select{
    Select:        0,
    AllOrDistinct: nil,
    As:            nil,
    Results:       []ast.SelectItem{
      &ast.Star{
        Star: 9,
      },
    },
    From: &ast.From{
      From:   11,
      Source: &ast.Join{
        Op:     "LEFT OUTER JOIN",
        Method: "",
        Hint:   (*ast.Hint)(nil),
        Left:   &ast.TableName{
          Table: &ast.Ident{
            NamePos: 18,
            NameEnd: 25,
            Name:    "Singers",
          },
          Hint: (*ast.Hint)(nil),
          As:   &ast.AsAlias{
            As:    -1,
            Alias: &ast.Ident{
              NamePos: 26,
              NameEnd: 27,
              Name:    "A",
            },
          },
          Sample: (*ast.TableSample)(nil),
        },
        Right: &ast.TableName{
          Table: &ast.Ident{
            NamePos: 48,
            NameEnd: 55,
            Name:    "Singers",
          },
          Hint: (*ast.Hint)(nil),
          As:   &ast.AsAlias{
            As:    -1,
            Alias: &ast.Ident{
              NamePos: 56,
              NameEnd: 57,
              Name:    "B",
            },
          },
          Sample: (*ast.TableSample)(nil),
        },
        Cond: &ast.Using{
          Using:  60,
          Rparen: 86,
          Idents: []*ast.Ident{
            &ast.Ident{
              NamePos: 67,
              NameEnd: 75,
              Name:    "SingerID",
            },
            &ast.Ident{
              NamePos: 77,
              NameEnd: 86,
              Name:    "FirstName",
            },
          },
        },
      },
    },
    Where:   (*ast.Where)(nil),
    GroupBy: (*ast.GroupBy)(nil),
    Having:  (*ast.Having)(nil),
  },
}

--- SQL
SELECT * FROM Singers A LEFT OUTER JOIN Singers B USING (SingerID, FirstName)
